abstract: A federal judge threw out an earlier verdict, saying a forewoman had “polluted” the jury with remarks she overheard outside the courtroom.
snippet: A federal judge threw out an earlier verdict, saying a forewoman had “polluted” the jury with remarks she overheard outside the courtroom.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge in New Orleans has ordered a new trial for a former BP engineer convicted of deleting text messages relevant to an investigation of the 2010 Gulf of Mexico oil spill, concluding that outside information influenced the jury’s verdict.

headline.main: Former BP Engineer Wins New Trial in Case on Gulf Spill
